channel.title: Top Stories on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Top Stories on NewsStreet

item.title: Odisha lines up mega events in 5 cities to celebrate FIH Men’s Hockey World Cup
item.description: Odisha lines up mega events in 5 cities to celebrate FIH Men’s Hockey World Cup Bhubaneswar: Odisha, the sports capital of India, is yet again ready to host the FIH (International Hockey Federation) Men’s Hockey World Cup 2023.

item.title: Court sentences man to 20 years rigorous imprisonment for raping 10-year-old girl
item.description: Court sentences man to 20 years rigorous imprisonment for raping 10-year-old girl Berhampur: A court in Odisha’s Ganjam district Tuesday sentenced a 53-year-old man to 20 years rigorous imprisonment for raping a girl three years ago.
